name: Prehistoric Warcraft
description:
Unique and excellent fighting: defeat the opponent in any situation, experience the passion of fighting, give full play to potential, and send out different skills through various key combinations.
Artificial intelligence: The opponent has strong strength and wisdom, and he will try his best to knock you down.
Secret: There are many secrets and surprises waiting for you to explore!
Hope: I hope you like this game, and I hope you can get happiness from this game!
